application.name: 积分兑换
application.description: 积分兑换，签到积分，购物积分，酒店积分兑换。通过本模块进行营销活动，可以获得用户的真实姓名、手机号码、邮寄地址等。
application.author: 晓楚

manifest.install:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_credit_request` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `from_user` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `award_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `createtime` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_award_list` ( `award_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `title` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `logo` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `amount` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `deadline` datetime NOT NULL, `credit_cost` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `price` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '100', `content` text NOT NULL, `createtime` int(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`award_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
manifest.uninstall: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_credit_exchange`; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_award_list`;
